title: Pixel Fantasy: Top-Down Heroes & Monsters Pack - 450 Sprites in 3 Sizes
description: This asset pack includes 150 high-quality 2D top-down view characters, perfect for RPG and fantasy games. Each character is meticulously designed with unique features and rich details, suitable for various game genres
longDescription:
Key Features:

Extensive Variety: Includes 150 meticulously designed characters, featuring heroes, monsters, and mythical creatures.

High-Quality Sprites: Available in three different sizes (256x256, 512x512, 1024x1024 pixels) with a resolution of 600 DPI, 32-bit color depth, and PNG format.

Transparent Backgrounds: Easy integration into any game environment without the hassle of removing backgrounds.

Diverse Use Cases: Perfect for RPGs, fantasy games, adventure games, and more.

Easy Integration, making it simple to incorporate into your projects.

How to Use:

This asset pack is designed to be versatile and easy to use. Whether you’re developing a complex RPG, a simple adventure game, or a fantasy-themed project, these top-down view characters can add depth and personality to your game world. The transparent backgrounds allow for seamless integration, saving you time and effort in the development process.

Integration and Support:

Integrating these sprites into your project is straightforward and hassle-free. This is the first version of the pack, and we are committed to providing updates and support to ensure it meets your needs.


We encourage you to leave feedback and ratings to help us improve future versions.


Contact Us:

For support or inquiries, feel free to contact us at adeiliz2023@gmail.com. Your feedback is invaluable and helps us deliver better products.


By choosing the "Pixel Fantasy: Top-Down Heroes & Monsters Pack," you are equipping your project with high-quality, versatile characters that will enhance your game's visual appeal and overall player experience. We look forward to seeing how you bring these characters to life in your games!
technicalDetails:
Technical Specifications:

Formats: PNG

Sizes: 256x256 pixels, 512x512 pixels, 1024x1024 pixels

Resolution: 600 DPI

Color Depth: 32-bit

Total Sprites: 450 (150 characters in 3 sizes each)

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
